DESCRIPTION: Attempts to improve itself after being played. This can only fill gray improvement slots.
Damage is increased by the given amount for each improvement slot filled.
Block is increased by the given amount for each improvement slot filled.
Magic number is increased by the given amount for each improvement slot filled.

Some cards have improvement slots along their left side. Orange improvement slots can be filled with Progress, blue improvement slots can be filled with Insight, and gray slots can be filled with either.
Insight can fill blue or gray improvement slots on cards to improve their effects.
Progress can fill orange or gray improvement slots on cards to improve their effects.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
